title: This trick improves the power efficiency of Nvidia’s RTX 4090
description: Nvidia's RTX 4090 has famously high power requirements, but you may be able to cut those down quite a lot.

title: Bob Dylan sorry for using handwriting machine to sign book
description: Music legend Bob Dylan has admitted to using an autopen to sign his new book, despite it being promoted as “hand-signed.”

title: Apple will pay $50M to settle the butterfly keyboard fiasco
description: Apple's butterfly keyboard spurred a class-action lawsuit in 2018. Several years later, Apple is ready to settle, and the sum is huge.

title: Neuralink demo shows monkey performing ‘telepathic typing’
description: The latest show-and-tell event from Elon Musk's brain-interface Neuralink venture showed a monkey typing telepathically.

title: The most innovative tech products of 2022
description: We tested a lot of products in 2022, but these are the ones that stood out from the rest of the pack and brought something new to the table
